name: I Heard There Are Monsters Here
name_original: I Heard There Are Monsters Here
description:
Welcome to "I Heard There Are Monsters Here"!
The beast continent is full of danger, and at the same time, there are countless minerals and wealth.

Make money mechanism:
Kill monsters and get wealth.
Employ miners to mine all kinds of ores and earn wealth automatically.
Random trigger events will make you rich overnight.

Role system:
Open 6 hero skins at the first version.
All character equipment is free of charge, as soon as 5 minutes.

Other systems:
Store system: Open to purchase 700+ upgrades to help you accumulate wealth
Achievement system: 700+achievements, rewards will be given immediately after completion
Inheritance system: open purchase of 100+magic will increase your income index by times
Festival system: five traditional Chinese theme festivals
Decoration system: equipment, which is also a hidden mechanism to help the home resist monsters

We are waiting for you to discover other ways to play !
